resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/63242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>63242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Familia de funciones. Tipos y operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Family of functions. Types and operations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie von Funktionen. Typen und 
Operationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Famille des fonctions. Types et 
exécutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Família das funções. Tipos e 
operações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Famiglia delle funzioni. Tipi e 
funzionamenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογένεια των λειτουργιών. Τύποι και 
διαδικασίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el estudio de familias de funciones dependientes de un parámetro. Se estudian familias de rectas que pasan por un punto y se generaliza al estudio de otras familias de funciones más complicadas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study families of functions which depend on a parameter. It studies families of lines with a common point and then generalizes the notion to other more complicated families of functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parámetro</string>
            <string language="en">parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">haz de rectas</string>
            <string language="en">one-parameter family of lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">familia de funciones</string>
            <string language="en">family of functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Familien von Funktionen zu studieren, welche von einem 
Parameter abhängen. Er studiert Familien der Zeilen mit einem 
geläufigen Punkt und generalisiert dann den Begriff zu anderen 
schwierigeren Familien von Funktionen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des familles des fonctions ce qui dépendent 
d'un paramètre. Il étudie des familles des lignes avec un 
point commun et puis généralise la notion à d'autres familles plus 
compliquées des fonctions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
famílias das funções quais dependem de um parâmetro. Estuda 
famílias das linhas com um ponto comum e generaliza então a noção 
a outras famílias mais complicadas das funções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare le famiglie delle funzioni quale dipendono da un parametro. 
Studia le famiglie delle righe con un punto comune ed allora 
generalizza la nozione ad altre famiglie più complicate delle 
funzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στις οικογένειες μελέτης των λειτουργιών που εξαρτώνται από μια 
παράμετρο. Μελετά τις οικογένειες των γραμμών με ένα κοινό
σημείο και γενικεύει έπειτα την έννοια σε άλλες πιό περίπλοκες 
οικογένειες των λειτουργιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parameter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einparameter Familie der Zeilen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie von Funktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paramètre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">famille d'un-paramètre des lignes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">famille des fonctions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">parâmetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">família do um-parâmetro das linhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">família das funções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parametro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">famiglia di un-parametro delle righe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">famiglia delle funzioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παράμετρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογένεια ένας-παραμέτρου των γραμμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογένεια των λειτουργιών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
